songs.title: Bad Gal Like Riri
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Nemesis]
Bend Yuh Back

[Chorus: Rizzla]
I need a bad gal like Riri
I need a thickaz like Nicki
I need a slimaz like Kendall
Ouu she blow me like a candle

[Chorus 2: Chillaa]
I need a bad gal like Riri
I need a young ting like Kylie
I need a slimaz like Kendall
She blow me like a candle

[Verse 1: Nemesis]
Set yuh foot suh
Mek a knee lift
Bend yuh back now
Paraplegic
Buss a bad wine
Mek mi seam it
Two of we a score like a free kick
Seh yuh freaky
Me have a sweety
Yuh nuh boring gal
Drop asleepy
You have a secret Victoria Keep it
Me ah reveal it

[Chorus: Rizzla]
I need a bad gal like Riri
I need a thickaz like Nicki
I need a slimaz like Kendall
Ouu she blow me like a candle

[Chorus 2: Chillaa]
I need a bad gal like Riri
I need a young ting like Kylie
I need a slimaz like Kendall
She blow me like a candle

[Verse 2: Nemesis]
Real bad gal
With the bore tongue
Kiss it kiss don't slow down
Pretty pum pum
Tek a photo
Video camera like a porno
Bounce pon it
Lean it
Sweet like seh a dream yuh a dream
You have a secret Victoria Keep it
Me ah reveal it

[Chorus: Rizzla]
I need a bad gal like Riri
I need a thickaz like Nicki
I need a slimaz like Kendall
Ouu she blow me like a candle

[Chorus 2: Chillaa]
I need a bad gal like Riri
I need a young ting like Kylie
I need a slimaz like Kendall
She blow me like a candle
